sentences.english: What?S. W is nat dead?Hahaha, I got a good idea.
sentences.chinese: 什麼？白雪公主沒死？哈哈哈，我又有一個好主意。

sentences.english: What?S. W is nat dead?Hahaha, I got a good idea.
sentences.chinese: 什麼？白雪公主沒死？哈哈哈，我又有一個好主意。

sentences.english: Ha-ha, you ask the right people.
You may not understand the videos since they are all in Chinese.
sentences.chinese: 你應該看不懂，全是中文，哈哈。

sentences.english: He made us all laugh by mimicking the teacher's voice.
sentences.chinese: 他模仿老師的聲音，逗得我們哈哈大笑。

sentences.english: Haha, you're wearing you sweater inside out.
sentences.chinese: 哈哈，你把你的毛衣穿反了。

sentences.english: Hahah comment from occidentals jelous people are so funny.
sentences.chinese: 哈哈哈那些西方人酸溜溜的評論真是好笑。

sentences.english: Hahah comment from occidentals jelous people are so funny.
sentences.chinese: 哈哈哈那些西方人酸溜溜的評論真是好笑。

sentences.english: They laughed and banged at the door.
sentences.chinese: 他們哈哈大笑地錘打洗手間的門。

sentences.english: After a short silence, he burst inro laughter.
sentences.chinese: 在沉默片刻後，他突然哈哈大笑起來。

sentences.english: Haha, I ah, this summer vacation to come back, we see grandmother.
sentences.chinese: 哈哈，我啊，這次放暑假回來，就來看外婆。

sentences.english: One day she saw his bi-lingual name cards and howled with laughter.
sentences.chinese: 一天，她看到了他的雙語名片，哈哈大笑。

sentences.english: Oh, you've finally got on the track, Mr.
sentences.chinese: 哈哈，你終於露出馬腳了，歐先生。

sentences.english: Probably you already know that is a distorting mirror.
sentences.chinese: 很可能你已經知道，那就是哈哈鏡。

sentences.english: I was happy after I found many bread in icebox.
sentences.chinese: 在冰箱裏看到很多面包的時候我覺得很幸運，哈哈。

sentences.english: Haha. After all, she is just a bird.
sentences.chinese: 哈哈，它畢竟只是一隻鳥啊。
